titles.title: A bill to provide assistance for agricultural producers adversely affected by damaging weather and other conditions relating to Hurricane Irene.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 9/7/2011--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) to provide emergency conservation program assistance and emergency watershed protection program assistance to agricultural producers in qualifying counties adversely affected by Hurricane Irene and related weather conditions.
